Body:
"""test_jcpot_barycenter
    """
ns1 = 150
ns2 = 150
nt = 200
sigma = 0.1
np.random.seed(1985)
ps1 = 0.2
ps2 = 0.9
pt = 0.4
Xs1, ys1 = make_data_classif('2gauss_prop', ns1, nz=sigma, p=ps1)
Xs2, ys2 = make_data_classif('2gauss_prop', ns2, nz=sigma, p=ps2)
Xt, yt = make_data_classif('2gauss_prop', nt, nz=sigma, p=pt)
Xs = [Xs1, Xs2]
ys = [ys1, ys2]
prop = ot.bregman.jcpot_barycenter(Xs, ys, Xt, reg=0.5, metric=
    'sqeuclidean', numItermax=10000, stopThr=1e-09, verbose=False, log=False)
np.testing.assert_allclose(prop, [1 - pt, pt], rtol=0.001, atol=0.001)
